search.query: `stamus_index` event_type=alert sourcetype="suricata:alert" alert.signature=*cleartext* OR (alert.signature=*password* AND alert.signature=*unencrypted*) | table src_ip, http.hostname, alert.signature | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET POLICY//" | rename src_ip AS "Target", http.hostname AS "Clear Text Password Server", alert.signature AS "Message" |stats count by Target,Message

`stamus_index` event_type=alert sourcetype="suricata:alert" alert.signature=*" tor "* |table flow.src_ip, alert.signature | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET POLICY //" |rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET //" | rename flow.src_ip AS "Target", alert.signature AS "Message" |stats count by Target,Message

`stamus_index` event_type=alert sourcetype="suricata:alert" alert.signature=*file* AND alert.signature=*sharing* AND alert.signature=*site* | table src_ip, http.hostname, dns.query.rrname,tls.sni, alert.signature | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET POLICY //" |rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET //" | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ETPRO INFO //" | eval "Abuser"=coalesce('http.hostname', 'dns.query.rrname','tls.sni') |rename src_ip AS "Target", alert.signature AS "Message" | stats count by Target,Message,Abuser

`stamus_index` event_type=alert sourcetype="suricata:alert" app_proto=dns |rename flow.dest_ip as Server | where NOT cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8", Server) AND NOT cidrmatch("192.168.0.0/16", Server) AND NOT cidrmatch("172.16.0.0/12", Server) | rename dns.query{}.rrname as "DNS Query" | table flow.src_ip,"DNS Query",Server,alert.signature | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET POLICY //" |rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET //" | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ETPRO INFO //" |rename flow.src_ip AS Target | stats count by Target,"DNS Query",Server,alert.signature | sort - count

`stamus_index` event_type=alert sourcetype="suricata:alert" app_proto=dns |rename flow.dest_ip as Server | where NOT cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8", Server) AND NOT cidrmatch("192.168.0.0/16", Server) AND NOT cidrmatch("172.16.0.0/12", Server) |rename dns.query{}.rrname as "DNS Query" | table flow.src_ip,"DNS Query",Server,alert.signature | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET POLICY //" |rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ET //" | rex field="alert.signature" mode=sed "s/ETPRO INFO //" |rename flow.src_ip AS Target | stats count by Target,"DNS Query",Server,alert.signature | sort - count

`stamus_index` event_type=tls sourcetype="suricata:tls" NOT tls.version="TLS 1.3" AND NOT tls.version="TLS 1.2" AND NOT tls.version="UNDETERMINED" | table src_ip, dest_port, dest_ip, tls.version | rename src_ip AS "Target", dest_ip AS "Offender", tls.version AS "TLS Version" | stats count by Target,Offender,"TLS Version"
